EmailTemplate.name: 09-27-2022 RET NACS 2022 Campaign Email 3.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: NACS 2022: We can’t wait to see you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NACS 2022 is right around the corner, and we have a lot in store for you. We are looking forward to showcasing where convenience fuel retail is headed and how you can succeed in running your store. As a reminder, you can learn more about virtualizing core store technology, self-checkout, and the latest NCR innovations in Loyalty, Food Service and Mobile technologies. If you have not yet, schedule a meeting now with one of our experts <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email3&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]>. See you soon at the NACS 2022 show at booth #5919! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
